annotations.msg: don't be dogmatic in your design strategy (e.g. OOP for one subsytem, data-oriented for another)
think if your problem better solved as a data transformation problem or a conceptual representation of the reality?
Don't Repeat Yourself (apart for breaking coupling or for performance)
think reponsabilities, collaboration, interface and constraints in your design
design with high-cohesion (change together, used together) and loose coupling for components and packages
design in compliance with Architectural Significant Requirements (*ility, etc.)
avoid disjoint functionnalities (low used feature surface vs attack surface ratio)

design an error handling strategy (e.g.: api boundary conversion, memory allocation failure (new_handler), error type handling (programmer error vs abstract machine unrecoverable error vs user recoverable error)
